name: cache-require-paths
description: Caches resolved paths in module require to avoid Node hunting for right module. Speeds up app load.

scripts.test: cd test; npm install; node index; node index --cache; node index --cache
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
scripts.size: t="$(npm pack .)"; wc -c "${t}"; tar tvf "${t}"; rm "${t}";

author: Gleb Bahmutov <gleb.bahmutov@gmail.com>
